website_summaries.verdict: The switch works well and it's easy to get running, but the clunky physical controls, lack of compatibility outside Apple and plain design prevent it from being a really great product.
pros: The switch is really easy to use and the simple design makes it hard to get confused with the controls

It also flows well with the Leviton Decora app and HomeKit, which give you greater control over brightness settings and, for $50 (roughly converted to £38 or AU$63), it's fairly cheap compared to most smart switches
cons: The physical controls are stiff and awkward and it can only work with HomeKit
Sorry, Android, Google Home and Alexa users

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these, each from different retailers. After flashing them for a firmware upgrade, they weren’t connecting to HomeKit. After hours of fiddling with them, I finally got them to work. However, any time the power went out/off, you had to try and get them to work again. Then, after barely being installed for a day, the one switch just completely died. These are absolute crap. I went out and paid more for the Casetta by Lutron. Save yourself the hassle hours wasted. customer_reviews.title: Constantly loses connection
customer_reviews.text: When these things stay connected, they work great. Very easy to connect and setup. However of the several HomeKit enabled devices that I have, these are the worst. I have 4 of these and sometimes one will lose connection and other times they all will. None of the other devices on my network have this issue. At $40 - 50 a piece, this should not happen. I would not recommend.

product_meta.title: Leviton DH6HD-1BZ 600W Decora Smart Dimmer, Works with Apple HomeKit
product_meta.description: Size:1 Pack| Style:600W DimmerApple HomeKit technology provides an easy, secure way to control lights and more from your iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch. Free “Leviton Decora Smart Home” app provides advanced lighting control settings including fade rate, minimum/maximum brightness, LED response activity, bulb type selection and more. Full range dimming (bright to dark) with adjustable fade rates and customizable settings via the app. Engineered to work with sensitive, low-wattage bulbs, ensuring “off means off”. It uses the latest generation of Leviton’s dimming technology for smart lighting control for a single LED bulb in a hallway or a strand of holiday lights, ensuring LEDs do not glow when off. Rated for dimmable CFL and LED loads up to 300W; incandescent and fluorescent up to 600W. 120V, 60Hz, neutral required. The dimmers feature true rocker action, pressing the top to turn on and the bottom to turn off. DH6HD is for use with HomeKit installations and utilizes the Apple TV for scheduling and remote access capabilities. If creating a comprehensive smart home via hub like Samsung SmartThings, Leviton recommends the DZ6HD. If you do not wish to use a hub but still desire voice controls and select third-party device integration, Leviton recommends the DW6HD. Screwless wallplate shown, but not included. Optional screwless wallplates available in several colors and sizes.
feature_bullets: HOMEKIT: Control from anywhere and create schedules when paired with an Apple TV, Home Pod, or iPad and the Apple Home app.
DECORA SMART HOME APP: Leviton Decora Smart Home app provides custom settings and local control over connected lights – dim/brighten your lights individually or turn off entire room at once.
VOICE CONTROL: Use Siri to turn lights on/off or dim with just your voice, “Siri, Dim Kitchen Light to 25%”.

RATINGS: Requires Neutral Wire; Dimmable LED and CFL loads up to 300W and incandescent loads up to 600W.Controlling this HomeKit-enabled accessory away from home requires an Apple TV (3rd generation or later) with Apple TV software 7.0 or later and an iPhone or iPad with iOS 8.1 or later
MULTI-LOCATION: Facilitates multi-location (3-way) dimming with up to 4 remote units (DD00R).
LEVITON: Making your home smarter and safer since 1906. Designed, engineered, and supported in USA with a 5-Year Limited .
